snippet: Swollen rivers and impassable roads left hundreds of people cut off in rural areas of Montana on Monday, while in neighboring Wyoming members of the National Guard joined the fight to protect two towns threatened by high water....

headline.print_headline: Flooding Swells Montana Rivers, Washes Out Roads
headline.main: Flooding Swells Montana Rivers, Washes Out Roads

lead_paragraph: Swollen rivers and impassable roads left hundreds of people cut off in rural areas of Montana on Monday, while in neighboring Wyoming members of the National Guard joined the fight to protect two towns threatened by high water.
